content:
Certainly! Here is another revised version of the Lord's Prayer in rhyme form, based on the version in the Sermon on the Mount in the book of Matthew in the Bible:

Dear Father, up above,
Your name is holy, filled with love.
Your kingdom come, your will be done,
On earth as it is in heaven, won.
Give us today our daily bread,
And forgive us, as we daily plead.
Forgive us, as we forgive,
Lead us not into temptation, but help us live.
Deliver us from evil, now and forever,
Amen, we pray, now and forever.
